description:
With the help of pop diva Mermaidol, a transforming copybat, and one desert merman, Chup’s tiny search party makes slow progress toward its target: Kranel No. 2  Xtreme Moisturizing Cream. Will they achieve Chup’s goal to satisfy Princess Melonia’s delicate skin?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sono Toki, Oretachi wa Subete o Shitta
そのとき, オレたちはすべてを知った
